sentences.en: A man's demeanor is high and elegant.
sentences.cn: 器宇高雅.

sentences.en: Although she is young, she has a mature demeanor.
sentences.cn: 看她小小的年纪, 性格却如此沉凝.

sentences.en: Bird expressed particular frustration with Stephen Jackson's on - court demeanor.
sentences.cn: Bird对于SJ表达明显的失望,尤其是他的场上行为.

sentences.en: But the picture wash out, really have a bit east Shi demeanor.
sentences.cn: 但照片洗出来, 还真的有点东施的风范.

sentences.en: Elegant and graceful, the whole demeanor is one and inquiring alertness.
sentences.cn: 气质文雅而优美, 整体行为特征是和谐、好奇且机警.

sentences.en: He answered, with simple demeanor and without embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 他用天真的态度毫不慌张地回答.

sentences.en: Her once serene image was shattered by a wild demeanor and bizarre public appearances, and her once pristine voice became raspy and hoarse, unable to hit the high notes as she used to.
sentences.cn: 她曾经的高贵形象也被其疯狂行为和古怪的公开亮相彻底击碎，她从前的纯净嗓音也变得沙哑，刺耳，无法唱出曾经的高音。

sentences.en: Her style and demeanor is a breath of fresh air.
sentences.cn: 她的风格和举止使人耳目一新.

sentences.en: His gloomy life deprived him of young people's cheerful demeanor.
sentences.cn: 惨苦的生活使他失去了年轻人应有的朝气.

sentences.en: His good demeanor spoke well for him when he went to apply for the job.
sentences.cn: 他去申请工作时,他良好的举止帮了他不少忙.

sentences.en: His use of the honorific'sir " would multiply while he assumed a glacial demeanor.
sentences.cn: 他会摆出一副冷若冰霜的样子,并不断使用 “ 阁下 ” 这种尊称.

sentences.en: I dislike his pompous demeanor.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌他那种爱摆架子的样子.

sentences.en: If you know your cat well you will be able to tell the difference in his demeanor.
sentences.cn: 如果你足够了解你的猫咪，那你应该能够分辨它行为上的不同。

sentences.en: One's demeanor is upright.
sentences.cn: 仪容 端庄

sentences.en: Scorpio The Scorpio animus is that intense, magnetic and mysterious creature clearly hiding volumes of dark secrets beneath a super-cool and calculated demeanor.
sentences.cn: 天蝎座——天蝎座女性的男性意向热情、极富吸引力、神秘，在他故意耍酷的行为背后无疑隐藏了许多隐秘之事。

sentences.en: She is acutely aware of the discrepancy between her inner state and her public demeanor.
sentences.cn: 她很敏锐地意识到自己内心状态和公众行为之间的不同。

sentences.en: She is quiet in her demeanor.
sentences.cn: 她举止文静.

sentences.en: The witness's demeanor in testifying provides useful guidance in making this assessment.
sentences.cn: 证人作证时的举止为作出上述判断提供了有用的指导.

sentences.en: We've detained Miss Demeanor long enough.
sentences.cn: 我们早就想扣留这位迪米娜小姐.

sentences.en: Your walk and posture and general physical demeanor before you talk to any potential one night stands is just as important, if not moreso.
sentences.cn: 在你寻找任何潜在的一夜情之前，你走路的姿势和行为举止都非常重要，不然的话就需要更多的信心。
